channel.title: Marvelous Designer on Korbin Nevius
channel.description: Recent content in Marvelous Designer on Korbin Nevius

item.title: Creature Sculpt Mimic
item.description: A mimic sculpt in Zbrush that was made for a Halloween projection show on the the library at Chatham University. The primary purpose of this model is to look good when rendered. This was originally rendered in Unreal Engine 5 but was revised and re-rendered in Marmoset Toolbag 5.
